Title: Cobain: Montage of Heck
Actors: Aaron Burckhard, Chad Channing, Don Cobain, Jenny Cobain
Plot: An authorized documentary on the late musician Kurt Cobain, from his early days in Aberdeen, Washington to his success and downfall with the grunge band Nirvana.
Awards: Nominated for 7 Primetime Emmys. Another 4 wins & 10 nominations.
Production: End of Music, HBO Documentary Films, Public Road Prods., Universal Pictures Intl. Entertainment
